txt.en: 'Argh!'
Use the Summoning Horn to call Frethi to your side.
Defeat the Shadowed King
'You dare reveal my true face?! You will die for this transgression!'

Long ago, Durin the Deathless sealed away an evil being known as the Shadowed King. Driven by intense jealousy, he wears the face of the Father of the Longbeards and builds a kingdom deep beneath the earth; a twisted reflection of the dwarf hall above, a mockery of the grandness of Khazad-dûm. He must be defeated, or his demented visions may become reality.
Defeated the Shadowed King
'Why have you come? Do you seek to oppose me? So be it.'
Defeat the Shadowed King.
'Lukan kaduruba inkh-hu. Zajalabalaga kâmin!'
'Can you not hear the whispers? He hungers....'
'My defeat means nothing. My master will be unleashed... one way... or another....'
Talk to Frethi
'Habanmâ zajalabalagamênu sullu!'
'Uthrokhâr zajalabalagamênu... sullu....'
Frethi is standing by inside Askâd-mazal.\n\nYou should talk to Frethi
'You have been charged with death, 'Shadowed King'! How dare you wear the face of Durin!'
At your signal, Frethi follows you into the cave
'Well done, [placeholder]! King Thorin will be pleased. Perhaps it is finally time for me to return to the Lonely Mountain.'
Pick up the Summoning Horn
Use the Summoning Horn to call Frethi

'Look at this place, [placeholder]! It is a twisted copy of Rushdurinul, Durin's own throne-room. How is this even possible? How long has this been here?\n\n'Hmph, these questions will have to wait. We have been charged with defeating the Nameless, and I want to cut the beard off that charlatan King personally!'
Use the Summoning Horn to call Frethi
Askâd-mazal, the Chamber of Shadows -- Solo
